body: Starting the year without illegal Africans in South Africa: "...this is how South Africa, it's government and people have decided to start the year: All Zimbabweans residing in SA ''illegally'' should apply for residence or will be repatriated to Zimbabwe!"
original_body: Starting the year without illegal Africans in South Africa: "...this is how South Africa, it's government and people have decided to start the year: All Zimbabweans residing in SA ''illegally'' should apply for residence or will be repatriated to Zimbabwe!"
title: South Africa: Starting 2011 without illegal Africans

sentence: Starting the year without illegal Africans in South Africa: "...this is how South Africa, it's government and people have decided to start the year: All Zimbabweans residing in SA ''illegally'' should apply for residence or will be repatriated to Zimbabwe!"
